recommendations: Gowthami Prithviraj ‚ÄúAmith was part of my team, I can say he is very diligent, dedicated, committed and reliable individual. He has great attention to detail and his candidate assessment and engagement skills are really amazing. He would be a great asset to any organisation. I wish him all the best in his future endeavors. ‚Äù

Lisa Stoppa ‚ÄúAmith is a strong technical recruiter who always made time to coach and mentor the Jr members on the team. He was an inaugural part of our teams continued success. I would be happy to have him on my team again.‚Äù

honors_and_awards.description: I was Nominated by my Team Lead Nithil Anilkumar and below is a write up what he had to say about me: "Amith is a new kid to the field but has put great efforts in a short period of time, Point Of Contact (Recruitment Relationship Manager) has great feedback about the quality of work he does every time and he is a valuable asset for the team. He locked up 3 offers and had 5 walk ins worth 5.5 and D4 quality audit score of 100% for the month of August, 2017"
